headline: McDonald's Caviar Kits Highlight New Collaborations And Valuation Questions
summary: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) is launching limited edition McNugget Caviar kits for Valentine's Day in partnership with Paramount Caviar. The company is rolling out the kits as an online, time limited drop aimed at fans of luxury food trends and social media friendly experiences. McDonald's is also introducing a Friends Meal collectible and a Frank's RedHot themed menu in Canada. These new offerings expand the brand's recent marketing collaborations and promotional campaigns. For McDonald's,...
